resources.string:
The "New formula" is from the paper "A reliable game fish weight estimation model for Atlantic Tarpon (Megalops Atlanticus)" (Ault and Luo, 2013)

 The "Old formula" is the classic (and quite inaccurate) weight = length * girth * girth / 800 (inches, pounds)

 This app is Free Software.
 If you want to donate anything, donate it to the Bonefish & Tarpon Trust (BTT).
 http://www.bonefishtarpontrust.org

 Bugs? Feature requests? I'm oggust@gmail.com
